description: A production-ready purchase management workflow to control the end-to-end lifecycle from purchase requisition through approvals, sourcing, purchase order issuance, goods receipt, invoice verification, and payment. The system provides stage-wise planned vs actual tracking with delay calculations, auditability, role-based access, and master-data driven dropdowns for consistent procurement operations.

sheets.name: Purchase Workflow Register

columns.name: Overall Status
columns.description: Overall case status (e.g., Open, On Hold, Cancelled, Closed)

columns.name: Case Owner User ID
columns.description: Primary responsible person for the case

columns.name: Last Updated By User ID
columns.description: User who last updated the record

columns.name: On Hold Flag
columns.description: Indicates if the case is on hold (Yes/No)

columns.name: Cancellation Flag
columns.description: Indicates if the case is cancelled (Yes/No)

columns.name: Required By Date
columns.description: Date by which goods/services are required

columns.name: Item Description
columns.description: Item/service description (free text if not in master)

columns.name: Estimated Total Value
columns.description: Estimated total value = Quantity * Estimated Unit Price

columns.name: Evaluation Method
columns.description: Evaluation method (L1/L2, QCBS, Lowest Cost, etc.)

columns.name: Selected Vendor ID
columns.description: Selected vendor ID from Vendor Master

columns.name: PO Dispatch Date
columns.description: Date PO was dispatched to vendor

columns.name: GRN Number
columns.description: Goods receipt note number / service entry reference

columns.name: Total Invoice Amount
columns.description: Total invoice amount = Invoice Amount + Tax Amount

columns.name: Payment Due Date
columns.description: Due date as per payment terms

columns.name: Bank Account Code
columns.description: Company bank account reference used for payment

stages.stage_description: Requestor raises a purchase requisition with item/service details, quantity, budget/cost center, and required-by date.
PR is validated for completeness, budget availability, and approved as per approval matrix.
Procurement issues RFQ and collects quotations from vendors for comparison.
Commercial and technical evaluation, negotiation, and final vendor selection with documented rationale.
PO is created with agreed terms and approved as per delegation of authority.
PO is sent to vendor and acknowledgement is received confirming acceptance and delivery schedule.
Goods are received and inspected (or services confirmed) and GRN/service entry is recorded.
Invoice is received and matched against PO and GRN/service entry; discrepancies are resolved.
Payment is approved and executed as per payment terms; transaction reference is recorded.
Case is closed after confirming delivery/payment completion; optional supplier performance review captured.

sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet tracking the complete purchase lifecycle with sequential stages, planned vs actual dates, and delay calculations.

sheets.name: User Master
sheets.description: Reference list of users for assignment, ownership, and approvals.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: Master data for suppliers/vendors used across RFQ, selection, PO, and payment.

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Master data for items/services used in PR and PO.

sheets.name: Department Master
sheets.description: Reference list of departments for PR ownership and reporting.

sheets.name: Cost Center Master
sheets.description: Reference list of cost centers for budget allocation and accounting.

sheets.name: Project Master
sheets.description: Reference list of projects for project-based procurement tracking.

sheets.name: Tax Master
sheets.description: Tax codes and rates used for procurement and invoicing.

sheets.name: Payment Terms Master
sheets.description: Payment terms reference list used in PO and payment scheduling.

sheets.name: Incoterms Master
sheets.description: Incoterms reference list for logistics and delivery responsibility.

sheets.name: Approval Matrix
sheets.description: Approval routing rules based on purchase type, department, and value thresholds.

sheets.name: Status Master
sheets.description: Dropdown values for overall status and decision statuses.

sheets.name: Reason Codes
sheets.description: Standardized reason codes for selection, hold, cancellation, and discrepancies.

sheets.name: Import Dump - Purchase Cases
sheets.description: Optional dump/import sheet for bulk loading purchase cases into the main workflow register.
